scripts.setup-play: snarkjs plonk setup dist/play.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_17.ptau dist/play_final.zkey
scripts.solver-play: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier dist/play_final.zkey dist/play_verifier.sol
scripts.verkey-play: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey dist/play_final.zkey dist/play_verification_key.json
scripts.build-play: yarn compile-play && yarn setup-play && yarn solver-play && yarn verkey-play
scripts.setup-draw: snarkjs plonk setup dist/draw.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_17.ptau dist/draw_final.zkey
scripts.solver-draw: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier dist/draw_final.zkey dist/draw_verifier.sol
scripts.verkey-draw: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey dist/draw_final.zkey dist/draw_verification_key.json
scripts.build-draw: yarn compile-draw && yarn setup-draw && yarn solver-draw && yarn verkey-draw
